ESS package¶

ESS¶

class ESS_package.ESS.ESS(model, Q, p_S_max, a, b, B, eta, SoE_0, V_n, SoE_min, SoE_max, Q_n)¶

Bases: object

Energy Storage System (ESS) model.

Superclass that models a linear ESS, being the latter the simplest one to be extended.

model¶

Identifier or name of the ESS model.

Type:

str

Q¶

Capacity in kWh.

Type:

float

p_S_max¶

Maximum charging/discharging power in kW.

Type:

float

a¶

Empirical cost model parameter.

Type:

float

b¶

Empirical cost model parameter.

Type:

float

B¶

Empirical cost model parameter.

Type:

float

eta¶

Efficiency.

Type:

float

SoE_0¶

Initial state of energy.

Type:

float

V_n¶

Nominal voltage of the ESS in V, assumed constant.

Type:

float

SoE_min¶

Minimum allowable state of energy, for a longer ESS life.

Type:

float

SoE_max¶

Maximum allowable state of energy, for a longer ESS life.

Type:

float

Q_n¶

Nominal capacity in kWh.

Type:

float

get_wear_cost(SoE_prev, p_S_k, delta_t)¶

Estimates the battery wear cost, by implementing to an empirical cost model.

Parameters:

  • p_GL_S (float) – Power flow between Grid Load (GL) and Storage (S) in kW.

  • delta_t (float) – Simulation timestep in seconds.

Returns:

C_b_k – Battery wear cost.

Return type:

float

update_SoE_ch(p_GL_S, p_GL, delta_t)¶

Updates the state of energy during charging.

Parameters:

  • p_GL_S (float) – Power flow between Grid Load (GL) and Storage (S) in kW.

  • p_GL (float) – Power from the Grid Load (GL) in kW.

  • delta_t (float) – Simulation timestep in seconds.

update_SoE_dch(p_GL_S, delta_t)¶

Updates the state of energy during charging.

Parameters:

  • p_GL_S (float) – Power flow between Grid Load (GL) and Storage (S) in kW.

  • p_GL (float) – Power from the Grid Load (GL) in kW.

  • delta_t (float) – Simulation timestep in seconds.

ESS empirical¶

class ESS_package.ESS_empirical.ESS_empirical(model, Q, p_S_max, a, b, B, eta, SoE_0, V_n, SoE_min, SoE_max, Q_n)¶

Bases: ESS

Subclass that models an semi-empirical ESS.

Models a Thevenin Equivalent Circuit ESS.

compute_ECM(i, x, y, Qr, delta_t)¶
get_req_quant(p_GL_S)¶

Calculates needed quantities for the model computation

Parameters:

p_GL_S (float) – Power flow between Grid Load (GL) and Storage (S) in kW.

ESS linear¶

class ESS_package.ESS_linear.ESS_linear(model, Q, p_S_max, a, b, B, eta, SoC_0, V_n, SoC_min, SoC_max, Q_n)¶

Bases: ESS

Subclass that models a linear ESS.

It is a formally a subclass, since it is equal to the superclass.
